name: Ternion
description:
WARNING! Game might contain bright, flashing lights (if you made it too far).

Made in 2 days for Internet Game | Mini-Game Jam - "One Button"

Control three spheres, don't let them touch any rombs.

Controls: any key or button for everything

Depending on device, online version can be a bit slow on response. For better gameplay on higher score I recommend downloading the game. Right now only windows version is available, I will add others in the morning.

Credits:

Astro Space Font by Wahyu Eka Prasetya

Adrift Among Infinite Stars by Scott Buckley | www.scottbuckley.com.au

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
